doc:
Earle Hyman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earle_Hyman 0 Earle Hyman (October 11, 1926 – November 17, 2017) was an American stage, television, and film actor. Hyman is known for his role on ThunderCats as the voice of Panthro and various other characters. He also appeared on The Cosby Show as Cliff's father, Russell Huxtable. Earle_Hyman ( October_11_,_1926 – November_17_,_2017 ) was an_American_stage , television , and film_actor . Hyman is_known for his_role on ThunderCats as the_voice of Panthro and various_other_characters . He also appeared on The_Cosby_Show as Cliff 's_father , Russell_Huxtable .
